sent.orig: The bank merged with its major rival.
sent.trans: 该银行与其主要对手合并了。

sent.orig: The two rival parties have no common ground between them.
sent.trans: 这两个敌对的党派之间没有共同点。

sent.orig: In the 21st century, the rival environment that enterprises are confronting is unceasingly changed and unpredicted.
sent.trans: 21世纪企业面临的竞争环境是一个不断变化、不可预测的环境。

sent.orig: In many sports bungee, your biggest rival is yourself.
sent.trans: 在蹦极和很多其他运动中，你最大的对手就是自己。

sent.orig: Never treat me as your rival.
